title: (x) 70s magazine black serif face - Trooper {Nick Cooke}
content:
Does anyone know what font this is?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141116092629im_/http:/typophile.com/files/font1.png)
author: Varglarsen

comments.content: We've seen this one before -- I think it was a pre-digital "alternative" version of Perpetua _very_ Black. Finding the thread will be a bitch though...
[This](http://web.archive.org/web/20141116092629/http:/www.typophile.com/node/4835) is the thread I was talking about.
